show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On his show, Alison connects the dots with Dr. <!--more--> Richard Clapp, a pioneering scientist, allied with the Lowell Center for Sustainable Production.
Dr Clapp has extensively researched the negative impact of chemical toxins on children’s and adult’s health.
In this program’s featured health action, we’ll step up to regulate toxic chemicals and to protect the public media http://healthjournalistblog.
com/featured-action-protect-public-media-and-regulate-toxic-chemicals/ where you can also sign up for upcoming radio show announcements and activism.
